ProofByContradiction2Declaration (python class)ÔÉÅ

See also

math concept | python inclusion class | python sample

This section presents the ProofByContradiction2Declaration python class.

This class models the declaration of the proof-by-contradiction-2 inference-rule in the target universe-of-discourse.

Punctilious users do not need to instanciate objects from this class. In effect, the UniverseOfDiscourse class exposes the proof_by_contradiction_2 property, and instanciation is automatic when the property is accessed for the first time.

class punctilious.ProofByContradiction2Declaration(universe_of_discourse, echo=None)ÔÉÅ

This method should be overridden by specialized inference-rule classes to provide accurate proofs.
